wagglefit 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

alter_in_place()

Alter a NumericVector inplace

calc_aic()

Calculate AIC values for a model

calc_dist()

Caluclates distance from waggle dance

calc_ks()

Run a KS test on the data

calc_ks_boot()

Run a bootstapped KS test on the data

ccdf_model_all()

Model ccdf function for scout and recruit superposition. Stores results in given array (y)

ccdf_model_scout()

Model ccdf function for scout model. Stores results in given array (y)

check_upper_bound()

Check the upper value to be used meets criteria

fit()

fit either the scout and recruit superposition model or the scout model to data

fit_mutliple()

Runs the model fitting (fit) on data multiple times and returns the paramaters with the highest loglikelihood

generate_bounds_all()

Generates bounds for all parameters of the scout recruit superposition model

generate_bounds_scout()

Generates bounds for all parameters of the scout model

generate_starting_ests_all()

Generates starting estimates for all numerical optimisation of all parameters of the scout recruit superposition model

generate_starting_ests_scout()

Generates starting estimates for all numerical optimisation of all parameters of the scout model

heaviside()

Heaviside equation. Replace negatives with 0 and positives with 1.

inverse_ccdf()

Calculates the ccdf for given data

loglike_model_all()

Log-likelihood function for scout and recruit superposition

loglike_model_scout()

Log-likelihood function for scouts

make_base_plot()

Creates ccdf plot of data

make_ccdf_plot_data()

Creates data for plots

make_full_plot()

Creates plots with model fits from optimised paramaters

make_results_tibble()

Converts results list to tibble

message_verbose()

Wrapper for message

model_ccdf()

Get model ccdf for a given model

model_number_from_model()

Get model number from model name

optimise_model()

Optimise function for fitting a model using NLOPT

recruit_ccdf()

Model CCDF function for recruits

recruit_dist()

Model function for recruits

scout_ccdf()

Model CCDF function for scouts

scout_dist()

Model function for scouts

trunc_normal()

Draws sample from a normal distribtion trucated between upr and lwr bounds.
